## Description

Converts Giotto object into a Seurat object


## Usage

```r
giottoToSeurat(obj_use = NULL, ...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`obj_use`     |     Giotto object
`...`     |     additional params to pass to [`get_spatial_locations`](#getspatiallocations)


## Value

Seurat object
